Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:16 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

item.title: The Ultimate Easy to Clean XXL Puppy Whelping Pad 72″x72″ – Our Washable Super Absorption Pee Pad is Perfect for Your Whelping Box Or Exercise Playpen- The Durable Non Slip Floor Mat for Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL: To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day! WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE? We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL:

To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day!

WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE?

We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a fantastic selection of stationery incl. planners & calendars, journals, organizers, and much more.

That “more” is providing the very best customer experience possible!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 72 x 72 x 0.2 inches; 4.4 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ zic-peepad74-39
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 6, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ZICOTO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085LLL9X9

Premium Non-Slip Material For Your Hardwood Floor: The bottom layer minimize the pad slipping on floors and stays safe in place; Top-notch materials & a heavy-duty black stitch design create a puppy pad with high durability
XXL Size For Playpens: With extra large 72″x72” the dog pen mat is perfectly sized for a standard indoor dog playpen/fence and it comes with rounded corners for the best fit
Washable & Reusable: Washable dog pee pads provide excellent value! Cut down the costs with reusable dog incontinence pads & simply put the pee pad up to 170°F in the washer & it will be like new
Extremely Versatile: Besides the benefits of the puppy training pads used for whelping or housebreaking, the piddle pads for dogs are also fantastic for floor and seat protection & as pads for any other pet playpen or rodent cages

THE REUSABLE ZICOTO DOG PEE PAD – 72″x72″

GROUNDBREAKING FOR WHELPING & RAISING PUPPIES

It is soft, waterproof, super absorbent and not only reduces any messy leaks, but also improves the well-being of your pup or adult dog: The premium washable dog pee pad for indoor dog pens from ZICOTO PETS. Thanks to a premium fabric multilayer design, maximum protection is ensured – for happy dogs, clean & dry floors and even happier dog owners:

– Top: quick absorption of liquids and discharge to 2nd layer – 2nd Layer: high density thickness & extremely absorbent – 3rd Layer: waterproof & breathable to prevent fluids from soaking through to the floor – Bottom: slip reducing fabric to keep the pee pad in place at all times

The extra large 72″x72″ dog exercise pad is a fantastic liner for your whelping box and housebreaking/potty training for a standard size indoor puppy playpen. This mat also suitable for kennels, as well as a car seat, furniture rug pad & hardwood floor protection and can be used for other pets like rabbits, or guinea pigs too.

The practical grey design combined with the black stitching fits perfectly with almost any interior.

Easily Machine washable & reusable – reduce trash, save money & protect the environment No need to buy disposal puppy pee pads, as ZICOTO Pee Pads are easy to take care of and can be reused for a long time to come. Please follow the simple washing instructions to get the most out of your XXL pee pad.

Upgrade your everyday life as dog parent with the washable dog pee pad by ZICOTO PETS!

Note: 1 reusable pad 72″x72″ incl (accessories/supplies shown in the images are not incl.).

4.5
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $42.99 - $31.75
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:06 UTC – Details)


Why choose our whelping pad?
Washable pee pads can be used for 300 of times
Anti slip rubber backing has won the love of the puppy,we say “stay”,it stay in the place
Can be cut, edges won’t unravel, easy to fit any whelping box,playpen,dog fences indoor,crate,kennel

Available sizes of waterproof puppy pads
36×41, 36×48, 54 x 54, 65 x 48, 72 x 72 inch

Package
1 pad in each package not including cage

4-layer waterproof mat for dogs
Fast absorbent material polar fleece for 1st layer keeps our puppy dry all the day
We can have fun with our pet on the bed or couch,don’t worry about the urine through to
puppy pads thanks to the 2nd layer use the highest quality waterproof material PU
Our whelping mat are sturdy enough to withstand the chewing of the puppies
Rubber dot used in 4th layer keep the pee pad precise stays in the place, no matter how naughty our puppies keeps crawling.

How to train our dog?
Usually, our dog is about to pee, he will starts to sniff around, now quickly guide it to the pad,
show our anger if pee on the floor, and clean without leaving a smell ;On the contrary,
give it a reward, such as feeding something and praising “good boy”, if the urine is properly on the pad.
Repeatedly, puppy will have a good habit of using a pad.

Service
We will feedback in 24 hours
HIGH SOAKING &LIVE SAVER–Quick absorbent and hold 8 cups( 68 oz ) of liquid ; top layer light grey colour covers any stains that might be on the pee pads ,no leak through or smell,prevents tracking,keep puppies dry all the night
NON-SLIP&EASY TO WASH -Upgraded non slip rubber backing maximizes doggy potty pads stay on bed or floor, puppies crawl more easier; just throw into the washer wash warm and tumble dry in low heat or hang dry, sanitary, stain free and good as new
DURABLE&ECO-FRIENDLY- Washable and reusable 300 of times,a must for any kind of housebreaking school for puppies and kittens; an excellent economic and environmental, beats buying endless bags of disposable pads
MULTI-USE-Extra large dog pads 72″ x 72″ perfect for whelping box 5′x 5′ & training puppies pee in dog playpen or assisting incontinence elderly dogs,great protection for bed,sofa, furniture,floor,carpet,car seat; ultra waterproof also be used as a floor protectors underneath the water bowl
NO MESS-After puppies potty training through pet pee pads ,we will feel relieved leaving doggie alone at home while us work.Even for 24 hours, floor still remain clean up.We just sell whelping pad not including cage

4.5
Price: $42.99 - $31.75
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:06 UTC – Details)
